messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Lookin for unschool group in Northeast	Ohio
messages.msgSnippet: ... If no one answers here, try the message boards at Unschooling.com (http://www.unschooling.com). There are also lists of support groups and state group(s)
messages.messageBody:
on 4/28/02 8:22 PM, k_conti85 at Kcbigmomma@... wrote:

> Hi, My name is Kimberly and I live in the Northeast Ohio area. I'm
> wondering if anyone knows of an unschooling group and or a teacher
> that is "unschool" friendly for portfolio review in my area? If so
> feel free to email me personally. Thanks!!!

If no one answers here, try the message boards at Unschooling.com
(http://www.unschooling.com).

There are also lists of support groups and state group(s) at Unschooling.com
and:

National Home Education Network (http://www.nhen.org)
Home Education Magazine ((http://www.home-ed-magazine.com)

Ohio may have a state email list supported by the state group so that might
be another good place to ask.

Joyce

messages.subject: Lookin for unschool group in Northeast Ohio
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, My name is Kimberly and I live in the Northeast Ohio area. I m wondering if anyone knows of an unschooling group and or a teacher that is unschool
messages.messageBody:
Hi, My name is Kimberly and I live in the Northeast Ohio area. I'm
wondering if anyone knows of an unschooling group and or a teacher
that is "unschool" friendly for portfolio review in my area? If so
feel free to email me personally. Thanks!!!
